citation.article-title: Description of Patulibacter americanus sp. nov., isolated from biological soil crusts, emended description of the genus Patulibacter Takahashi et al. 2006 and proposal of Solirubrobacterales ord. nov. and Thermoleophilales ord. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the order Rubrobacterales Rainey et al. 1997
Known members are thermophilic, non-motile rods–cocci that stain Gram-positive and contain l-Lys as the diamino acid at position 3 of the peptidoglycan and MK-8 as the predominant menaquinone.

Further characterized by the presence of 16S rRNA gene sequence signatures C–G, A–U, U–A, G–C, G–C, U–A, C–G and C– G at positions 63 : 104, 70 : 98, 139 : 224, 144 : 178, 657 : 749, 953 : 1228, 954 : 1226 and 1051 : 1207, respectively.
